decks.notes: This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures with a low mana curve to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco, alongside efficient removal like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames, it aims to overwhelm the opponent as quickly as possible. The inclusion of Leyline cards provides additional protection and synergy within the deck. Utilizing a 4/5 color Aggro archetype allows for a diverse range of powerful cards to be included, ensuring a strong and versatile playstyle.

The deck focuses on gaining life through Martyr of Sands and Abiding Grace, while using cards like Solitude and Skyclave Apparition for removal. The goal is to maintain board control with efficient creatures like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Eagles of the North. The inclusion of The One Ring and Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines provide additional value and win conditions. The deck also includes various utility cards like Kami of False Hope and Wrath of God to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent while aggressively gaining life and controlling the board.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and using spells to protect and enhance them. It utilizes a mixture of powerful creatures like Scion of Draco and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors of mana. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional protection and disruption against opponent's strategies. The overall strategy is to apply pressure early and often, overwhelming the opponent with fast, efficient threats.

The deck focuses on using Indomitable Creativity to cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. It combines control elements like Mana Tithe and Prismatic Ending with card advantage engines like Wrenn and Six to protect the combo pieces. Leyline Binding helps to stall the game until the combo can be assembled. Overall, the deck showcases a unique and creative way to generate advantage and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures.

The deck focuses on using a variety of creature cards to create a toolbox of options for different situations. By utilizing cards like Chord of Calling and Eldritch Evolution, the player can search for specific creatures such as Yawgmoth, Thran Physician or Strangleroot Geist to create powerful combos and control the game. The deck also includes cards like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Blood Artist to drain opponents' life totals while maintaining board presence. With mana acceleration from cards like Wall of Roots and Ignoble Hierarch, the deck can efficiently assemble its creatures and overwhelm the opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combination of Indomitable Creativity and Leyline Binding to quickly and efficiently cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty. It also uses various disruption spells like Lightning Bolt, Get Lost, and Spell Pierce to control the board and protect the combo. Teferi, Time Raveler and Wrenn and Six provide additional utility and card advantage. The mana base includes fetch lands and multicolor lands to ensure smooth mana fixing. Overall, the deck aims to surprise and overwhelm opponents with a unique and powerful combo strategy.

This Modern 1 vs 1 deck focuses on using the combo potential of cards like Song of Creation and Underworld Breach to quickly and efficiently generate value and win the game. The deck includes various card draw and manipulation spells to dig for key pieces of the combo, as well as mana ramp and land fetching cards to ensure smooth gameplay. The goal is to set up the combo pieces as quickly as possible while disrupting the opponent's game plan, leading to a decisive victory through a powerful and synergistic combination of cards.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant, and Urza's Tower) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. It utilizes control elements such as counterspells (Force of Negation, Remand, Condescend), removal (Cyclonic Rift, Fire / Ice), and disruptive creatures (Subtlety, Tishana's Tidebinder) to stall the game and protect its strategy. The deck aims to use Karn, the Great Creator to find key artifacts like The One Ring, LÃ³rien Revealed, and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon to control the board and eventually win the game with powerful threats like Emrakul, the Promised End.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures with a mix of city's blessing and various land types, enabling the player to cast powerful spells that deal damage and control the board. The key strategy is to quickly establish a strong board presence with efficient creatures and use burn spells to clear the way for attacks. The deck leverages the Leyline cards to provide protection and additional power to your creatures, while also ensuring consistent mana base to cast spells efficiently. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful aggro strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing creatures with high power and toughness to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By incorporating a variety of creatures from different colors and utilizing powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames, the deck aims to deal damage efficiently and consistently. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra layer of strategy and consistency to the deck. With a strong mana base and a mix of aggressive creatures and versatile spells, this deck aims to win through fast and aggressive plays.

This deck focuses on assembling the Amulet Titan combo by using cards like Primeval Titan and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove to ramp up mana quickly. The goal is to create a powerful board presence and overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and combo interactions. The deck also utilizes Urza's Saga to search for key pieces and generate value. With a mix of lands and powerful spells, the deck aims to bring out powerful threats and win the game through its explosive combo potential.

This deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures with unique abilities to create powerful combos and efficiently control the board. By utilizing creature toolbox cards like Chord of Calling and Eldritch Evolution, the deck can search for specific creatures to fit the situation. Yawgmoth, Thran Physician serves as both a combo piece and a means of card advantage, while Grist, the Hunger Tide provides token generation and versatility. The deck's mana base is carefully constructed to support its diverse range of creatures and maximize its potential for explosive plays.

The deck focuses on using Indomitable Creativity to quickly cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and disrupt the opponent with counterspells like Spell Pierce. The deck also utilizes versatile cards like Fire/Ice and Wrenn and Six for control and card advantage. The combination of Leyline Binding and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker allows for consistent card draw and disruption. The mana base includes fetch lands and shock lands to ensure consistent mana fixing. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful combos and creative plays.

This deck aims to quickly reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Fallaji Archaeologist while disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Grief and Thoughtseize. Using a combination of removal spells like Solitude and Prismatic Ending, along with protection spells like Ephemerate and Force of Negation, the deck is able to maintain control of the board while setting up its combo. Faithful Mending and Tainted Indulgence provide card draw and graveyard manipulation to fuel the reanimation strategy. With a mix of aggressive threats and disruptive elements, the deck aims to consistently outpace and outvalue the opponent.

The deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate. It also disrupts the opponent's game plan with cards like Grief and Thoughtseize. The deck utilizes a mix of instant spells and creatures with enter-the-battlefield effects to create powerful combos and generate value advantage. It has a versatile removal suite to deal with threats on the board. The land base is designed to support the deck's color requirements while also providing options for tutoring with cards like Flooded Strand and Polluted Delta.
